EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
We would like to invite you all to a transition morning taking place next week. This is essentially a ‘moving up’ session whereby your children and yourselves get to meet your new teachers. For those teachers who have not arrived in KL yet, your child will see a PowerPoint presentation on their teacher.
It is on Thursday 11th July from 8 – 9.30am. Please inform us by Tuesday if your child will be attending.
Kind Regards,
Administration Team The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
